channel.title: [PI] Combat Help [PI]
channel.description: Whenever i go to attack a NPC, for example: Blue Dragon, i click it and then the character walks backwards, but faces the Npc like its trying to attack it, but the character just keeps going backwards, i have no clue what going on, if u think u can fix and need to see more i can give my my teamviewer ID and Pass.

item.title: [PI] Combat Help [PI]

item.description:
@swebbyscape wrote:

Whenever i go to attack a NPC, for example: Blue Dragon, i click it and then the character walks backwards, but faces the Npc like its trying to attack it, but the character just keeps going backwards, i have no clue what going on, if u think u can fix and need to see more i can give my my teamviewer ID and Pass.
